review.title: “Worse company ever to work fo”
review.pros: Pros – I can't think of any pros
review.cons: Cons – Worst company ever worked for in my life I was a professional salaried employee and was micromanaged. They pick and choose who they like and those individuals are treated different than others. Benefit cost tripled in 1 year. Lay off with no severance. Managers are micromanagers.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Talked to the employees that are making your company successful and learn how they are being treated. Afterall "people" are your best asset.
